name: Pterosaur Flight Simulator 3D
description:
Have you played other games with the dinosaurs? But you always dream to fly? Quetzalcoatlus is your way to discover from the late Triassic to the end of the Cretaceous Period. Pterosaurs are closely related to birds, but some were as large as F-16 !

FLY IN SEARCH OF FOOD
From very small to very big, from slow to fast - your food will try to defense, but you must be stronger and faster !

REALISTIC 3D GRAPHICS
Take a look at screenshots - high details at everything - from dinos to forest environment sounds

EASY TO USE CONTROLS
Just a single joystick and "attack" button will give you the full control of your mega bird !

OPEN WORLD
You can fly without limits ! Really, there are no limits at all, its not a racing track - its an endless world full of dinosaurs.

UPGRADES
Use "upgrades screen" to boost your character parameters - speed, energy and more

HAVE FUN !
